about_the_game:
!! IIMPOSTOR FACTORY SPOILERS AHEAD !!

=========================================
Original soundtrack of Impostor Factory.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Files will be located in the folder Impostor Factory Soundtrack.
Format: 320kbps MP3
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
*Tracklist*
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 Trailer Theme
2 Impostor Factory - Title Theme
3 A Shroud of Rain
4 Make Yourself at Manor
5 The Observer
6 Fuzzy Tumbles
7 First Murder
8 The Guests
9 Twice a Stranger
10 Something Amiss [from To the Moon]
11 The Guests (Decayed Version)
12 Tangents of Peculiarity
13 To Chase a Murderer
14 Cat Scary
15 The Guests (Decayed Version 2)
16 Vinyl Record
17 The Asylum
18 Twenty Six Past Three
19 Twenty Six Past Three (Void Version)
20 Earth or Sky (Day Version)
21 Left to Chance
22 Somber Steps
23 Earth or Sky (Night Version)
24 Another Morning
25 Quincy
26 Library Days
27 Finding the Notes
28 See the World (Piano Version)
29 The Earth to Your Sky
30 Serenity [from To the Moon]
31 Double O Six Point Five
32 Basement Tour
33 The Machine
34 The Days
35 Back Home
36 See the World
37 Airsick
38 Predisposition (Piano Version)
39 A Decision For Two
40 Heartbeat (Piano Version)
41 Heartbeat (Music Box Version)
42 Predisposition
43 A Decision Of Two
44 Waking Up (Piano Vers.)
45 Heartbeat
46 Just a Lavender
47 Path of a Life
48 Beginning of an End
49 Make Yourself at Manor (Void Version)
50 Single-Threaded Firewall [from Finding Paradise]
51 The Hypothesis
52 The Final Test
53 Long Way Up
54 A World Beyond
55 Waking Up
56 The Mirror Lied [from The Mirror Lied]
57 All There Is
58 One Last Trip
59 A Reality Somewhere (Ending Suite)
60 Lullaby from a Star (Credit Theme feat. Pealeaf)
61 Great Wide Unknown (Bonus Song by Pealeaf)

=========================================
Instruction:
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
To locate the OST:
1. Right click Impostor Factory from Steam library
2. Go to Property -> Local Files tab -> Browse Local Files
3. Find OST in the folder "Impostor Factory - Original Soundtrack"
=========================================
Credits:
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* by Pealeaf
* All other tracks by Kan Gao
=========================================
[*More updates to come in the future, including FLAC version.]

short_description: Original soundtrack of Impostor Factory, including bonus tracks.
